content: It first appeared in our 2021 annual report on Form 10-K, and we have repeated it in our quarterly filing since, and it reads, we are in the process of more completely unifying the company under a single platform strategy that will serve as the foundation for the entire enterprise by enabling our applications through a common technology platform known as hStream, we believe that standalone applications, which already provide a powerful value proposition, will begin to leverage each other to more efficiently and effectively empower our customers to manage their businesses and improve their outcomes.
